1.title: Documentation and Updates
1.description: From this version, the addon has an official documentation and the update log will be documented in this page

2.title: Compatibility
2.description: This version has been made compatible with Blender 4.1, as some APIs have been modified in it, the addon is retro-compatible up to Blender 2.8

3.title: Online documentation Buttons
3.description: Bmesh Clean now has an online documentation system, with a button for each operator that will take you directly to the online documentation (Right click with mouse on the operator or properties)

4.title: Update Message System
4.description: The addon periodically checks for updates, and if there are any, it shows a message, the option can be disabled

5.title: Unofficial Version Alert
5.description: If the version of the Blender is in Alpha or Beta, the addon will show a message alerting, a button will be available to disable the alert

6.title: Interface Change Option
6.description: The addon now has an option to change the interface, the user can choose between 2 tipes of interface, the Classic and the Checkmark version
